column4: Anyone know if there are any Linux drivers to Gigabyte motherboard?
the card is most likely supported out of the box by the kernel
are you sure? should the CPU be on 25% on idle in ubuntu or do i need drivers?
run htop to see what's eating your cpu
it says "root" is consuming 15% CPU, is this normal?
root is a user, not a process
the actuall process name is on the far right
if you press F6, then move to CPU%, then it will sort by cpu usage
ok.. it says something /usr/X11R6/bin/X is consuming 15%
and if i just move the window of the terminal it jumps to 35% CPU
what gfx card do you have?
Radeon HD 5770, i have installed the ati drivers for my graphic card ...
are you there
known bug with catalyst
asuming you are using catalyst
yes
there is some patches for xorg-server that can help
where can i get them?
I'm running cataluyst 10.5 with a patched xorg-server 1.8  and it works nicely (as nicely as the horrible catalust drivers can work, anyway)
how do i download and install a patched xorg-server 1.8?
might be in ppa
I don't run ubuntu so that makes it easier for me
